clinical_study.brief_title: A Prospective Clinical Trial in Chronic Hepatitis B Patients NAs (Nucleotides or Nucleosides) Experienced (Anchor Study)
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Randomized Clinical Trial of Combination Sequential Treatment With Y Peginterferon Alfa-2b and ETV (Entecavir) in CHB (Chronic Hepatitis B) Patients NAs (Nucleotides or Nucleosides) Experienced (Anchor Study)

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multi-center, randomized, prospective, open-label Phase III Clinical trial to assess the efficacy and safety of combination and sequential treatment with Y peginterferon Alfa-2b,entecavir and GMCSF in chronic hepatitis B patients nucleotides or nucleosides experienced. Patients were randomized to one of 3 groups to receive different antiviral treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients who have been pretreated with and responded to one or two nucleotides or nucleosides for at least one year, with HBV (Hepatitis B Virus) DNA less than 1000 copies/ml and HBsAg less 3000 IU/ml were randomized to one of 3 groups, to receive Y peginterferon Alfa-2b 180mcg/week for 96 weeks, entecavir 0.5 mg po daily for 48 weeks plus GMCSF (Granulocyte-macrophage colony stimulating factor) for 48 weeks, or Y peginterferon Alfa-2b 180mcg/week for 96 weeks and entecavir 0.5 mg po daily for 48 weeks, or only ETV for 96 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of HBsAg loss at week 96
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Percentage of HBsAg loss at week 96

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in HBsAg quantification and HBsAg decline at week 96
secondary_outcome.description: HBsAg quantification and HBsAg decline from baseline are measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in HBsAg seroconversion at week 96
secondary_outcome.description: HBsAg seroconversion from baseline is measured.

other_outcome.measure: Percentage of HBeAg loss or HBeAg seroconversion at week 96 for HBeAg positive patients
other_outcome.description: Percentage of HBeAg loss or HBeAg seroconversion are measured at week 96 for patients with HBeAg positive at baseline

other_outcome.measure: Percentage of HBV DNA normalization and ALT normalization at week 96
other_outcome.description: Percentage of HBV DNA normalization and ALT normalization at week 96 are measured.

other_outcome.measure: Percentage of sustained virology response at week 120
other_outcome.description: Sustained virology response is measure at follow up week 24

arm_group.description: Drug: Entecavir and or adefovir dipivoxil are used for 96 weeks and the follow up 24 weeks. Entecavir 0.5mg po daily or plus ADV （adefovir dipivoxil）10mg po daily.
Drug: Y peginterferon Alfa-2b 180 micrograms sc/week for 96 weeks; Drug: Entecavir and or adefovir dipivoxil are used for 48 weeks. Entecavir 0.5mg po daily for 48 weeks or plus ADV 10mg po daily.

Drug: Y peginterferon Alfa-2b 180 micrograms sc/week for 96 weeks; Drug: Granulocyte-macrophage colony stimulating factor is used for 48 weeks; Drug: Entecavir and or adefovir dipivoxil are used for 48 weeks. Entecavir 0.5mg po daily for 48 weeks or plus ADV 10mg po daily.

intervention.description: In arm 2 and 3, Y peginterferon alfa-2b is used for 96 weeks
In arm 3, Granulocyte-macrophage colony stimulating factor is used for 48 weeks intermittently
In arm 1, Entecavir and or adefovir dipivoxil are used for 96 weeks and the follow up 24 weeks as conventional control, In arm 2 and 3, Entecavir and or adefovir dipivoxil are used for 48 weeks.
